description: A small island north of Dressrosa, connected by a bridge. It serves as the rendezvous point where Doflamingo's trap for Law unfolds.

keyEvents.title: Robin Communicates from Underground
keyEvents.description: Robin's clone appears from the ground to communicate with Law about being trapped in the Tontatta Kingdom.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the underground civilization beneath Green Bit.

keyEvents.title: Admiral Issho Arrives
keyEvents.description: Admiral Issho arrives at Green Bit with Marines, cutting off Law's escape.
keyEvents.significance: The trap begins to close on Law.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Arrives
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo arrives at Green Bit, completing the trap around Law.
keyEvents.significance: Law is now completely surrounded with no escape.

keyEvents.title: Law Questions Doflamingo
keyEvents.description: Law questions Doflamingo about his World Noble connections at the exchange point.
keyEvents.significance: First hint at Doflamingo's true background.

statusHistory.reason: Island serves as the location for the confrontation between Law, Doflamingo, and Admiral Issho

description: A massive colosseum in Dressrosa where gladiatorial tournaments are held. In this episode, Block C battles take place.

keyEvents.title: Block C Begins
keyEvents.description: Gatz announces the start of Block C with all gladiators entering the arena.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most important blocks featuring Luffy and powerful fighters.

keyEvents.title: Ideo Defeats Hajrudin
keyEvents.description: Ideo demonstrates his explosive punching power by launching the giant Hajrudin.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the high level of competition in Block C.

keyEvents.title: Kelly Funk's Jake Jake no Mi
keyEvents.description: Kelly demonstrates his ability to become a jacket worn by Bobby.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces a unique Devil Fruit ability.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Struggles to Hide Powers
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats opponents but struggles to hide his rubber abilities.
keyEvents.significance: Creates tension as Luffy's identity is nearly exposed.

statusHistory.reason: Colosseum hosts the Block C tournament

description: A kingdom in the New World ruled by Donquixote Doflamingo. The island where Sanji escapes with Viola and where news of Doflamingo's fake resignation spreads.

keyEvents.title: News Correction Delivered
keyEvents.description: News Coo delivers papers revealing Doflamingo's resignation was false.
keyEvents.significance: The entire island learns of Doflamingo's deception.

keyEvents.title: Viola Helps Sanji
keyEvents.description: Viola aids Sanji in escaping from Doflamingo's men.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Warns Law
keyEvents.description: Sanji contacts Law to warn about Doflamingo's trap.

statusHistory.reason: Island serves as the main setting for multiple storylines

description: An underground kingdom beneath Green Bit, home to the Tontatta dwarves. Robin and Usopp are trapped here during this episode.

keyEvents.title: Robin Trapped Underground
keyEvents.description: Robin explains she and Usopp are stuck underground in the Tontatta Kingdom.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the parallel storyline beneath Green Bit.

statusHistory.reason: Kingdom holds Robin and Usopp captive
